headerDisplay: Register your TeslaFi [account ](https://www.teslafi.com/signup.php?referred=loftux) or [login ](https://teslafi.com/userlogin.php) to get your API token.
footerDisplay:
You can add more Teslas using the **Add Platform** button.
*This is only supported with Homebridge 1.3.0 or above.* See Readme.

name.title: Tesla Car Name
name.description: The name used as prefix in Homekit controls.

token.title: Teslafi API Token
token.description: Your Teslafi token. Create one in your Teslafi accounts page. Remember to activate API Services you intend to use.

lowBatterylevel.title: Low Battery Warning below percent
lowBatterylevel.description: At what level would you like Homekit warn you of low battery. Independent of Car low batterey level.

teslafiRefreshTimeout.title: Refresh Teslafi data every n sceonds
teslafiRefreshTimeout.description: How often should car data be fetched from Teslafi. 60s (default) is a resonable setting.

wakeupTimeout.title: Wait n sceonds for care to wake up
wakeupTimeout.description: If the car is sleeping when a command is sent, try to wake the car first and wait for n secons. Set to 0 if you don't want to wake the car. Lower value than 15 can be set, but not recommended.

tempUnit.title: Temperature Display Units
tempUnit.description: Not in use: Turns out Homekit deals with all values in C, and if you have set iOS to prefer F it will handle that.

rangeUnit.title: Range Display Units
rangeUnit.description: For future use when range display is implemented
